show_name: CROSS ANGE Rondo of Angel and Dragon (TV)
other_title: Cross Ange: Rondo of Angels and Dragons
Cross Ange: Tenshi to Ryū no Rondo (Japanese)
クロスアンジュ 天使と竜の輪舞 (Japanese)
plot: Humanity has advanced to great heights since it obtained the information technology known as "Mana." With that nearly magical power, problems like war, food shortages, and pollution have been eliminated. This age of peace and freedom, the Empress Angelese of the Misurugi Empire is a privileged girl with no disabilities. She learns, however, that she is a "Norma," a kind of human who cannot use Mana and are outcasts of society. Having lost everything, she is sent to an isolated island. There she meets other Normas who ride in humanoid weapons called Para-mails, protecting the world from dragons invaders from another dimension.
opening_theme: "Kindan no Resistance" (禁断のレジスタンス;Forbidden Resistance) by Nana Mizuki (eps 1-12)
"Shinjitsu no Mokushiroku" (真実の黙示録; The Apocalypse of Truth) by Yoko Takahashi (eps 13-25)
ending_theme: "Shūmatsu no Love Song" (終末のラブソング;Love Song of the End) by Nana Mizuki (eps 13-24)
"Kindan no Resistance" (禁断のレジスタンス;Forbidden Resistance) by Nana Mizuki (ep 25)
insert_song: "Towagatari ~El Ragna~" (永遠語り～El Ragna～;Eternal Story ~The Goddess~) by Yui Horie & Nana Mizuki (eps 11,16,25)
"Towagatari ~Hikari no Uta~" (永遠語り～光ノ歌～; Eternal Story ~Song of Light~) by Nana Mizuki (eps 1,10,12)
"Towagatari ~Hikari no Uta~" (永遠語り～光ノ歌～; Eternal Story ~Song of Light~) by Toshihiko Seki (eps 13,20,23)
"Towagatari ~Kaze no Uta~" (永遠語り～風ノ歌～;Eternal Story ~Song of the Wind~) by Yui Horie (eps 11,24)
